data.Note: I inadvertently submitted this with the name "split lists".
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There needs to be a Perl implementation of Skip Lists.

    Actually, the module is already uploaded but I would like to
    register the name space.

    Even though functionally they look like trees (and the interface
    imitates some of the Tree modules), the Tree::* namespace is not
    appropriate since they are special types of linked lists, not trees.

    Note: I inadvertently submitted this with the name "split lists".
    Bad typo. Very bad. Also, I referred to them as "treeps" which is an
    altogether different structure.
